titles: The ansvvere of Mr. Richard Hooker to a supplication preferred by Mr Walter Travers to the HH. Lords of the Privie Counsell
author: Hooker, Richard, 1553 or 4-1600.
Jackson, Henry,  1586-1662.
publisher: Printed by Ioseph Barnes, and are to be sold by John Barnes dwelling neere Holborne Conduit [, London],
notes: A reply to: Travers, Walter.  A supplication made to the Privy Counsel.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-D⁴ E² .
E1 is in two settings: recto catchword is (1) "beene" or (2) "haue".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Travers, Walter, 1547 or 8-1635. --  Supplication made to the Privy Counsel --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
